Floor
Class Floor

java.lang.Object
  Floor.Floor

public class Floor
extends java.lang.Object

Class that shows the floor and its behavior. It defines the floorNumber, as well as getting requests.

Author:
Shabbir Vijapura/Harmeet Masuta

addRequest

public void addRequest(FloorRequestDTO request)
Adds a request to the elevator and then retrieves the floor number

Parameters:
request - - takes in a request and processes it as long as the request isn't for an invalid floor

getRequests

public java.util.ArrayList<FloorRequestDTO> getRequests(int elevatorNumber,
                                                        int floorNumber)
An ArrayList that get and store the FloorRequest based off the elevatorNumber and floorNumber

Parameters:
elevatorNumber - - Number of the elevator that responds to the request
floorNumber - - Floor number the elevator will be arriving at
Returns:
- the requests that were made by the users for an elevator to their floor
